episodes.title: Cult Leader Convicted for Car Bombing and Mass Suicide | Law & Order | PD TV
episodes.description:
The legal battle to hold a charismatic cult leader accountable for a fatal explosion and the eventual tragic end of his followers.

Season 4 Episode 7 'Apocrypha': A parking garage explosion is linked to a young woman missing for four years who was living in a religious cult. The investigation leads to Daniel Hendricks, a former Green Beret explosives expert. Prosecutors charge Hendricks with felony murder by arguing his "brainwashing" was a form of kidnapping. After his conviction, the detectives discover the entire cult has committed mass suicide.

Two Part drama which focuses on the New York criminal Justice System showing a violent crime investigated by police detectives and then the trial of the accused in court by the prosecutors.
Watch full episodes of Law & Order here: 
https://www.justwatch.com/uk/tv-series/law-and-order-1990 


Welcome to PD TV! A channel dedicated to your favourite Police Dramas! Featuring the most iconic moments from your favourite shows. Follow the professional and personal lives of the law enforcement from the crime scene to the court room.
